typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DateNum as string,
		Date as string,
		YearMonthNum as string,
		YearQuaterNumber as string,
		Calendar_Quarter as string,
		Month as string,
		MonthName as string,
		ShortMonthName as string,
		MonthOfQuarter as string,
		WeekNum as string,
		DayNumOfYear as string,
		DayOfQuarter as string,
		DayNumOfMonth as string,
		DayNumOfWeek as string,
		DayName as string,
		ShortDayName as string,
		WeekOfMonth as string,
		WeekOfQuarter as string,
		WeekOfYear as string,
		YearNumberMonthName as string,
		YearNumberMonthNameAbbr as string,
		YearNumber as string,
		DaysYearNumber as string,
		LeapYearIND as string,
		FirstDayOfWeekIND as string,
		WeekBeginDate as string,
		Week_End_Date as string,
		WeekEndIND as string,
		LastDayOfWeekIND as string,
		Quarter as string,
		DayNumOfQuarter as string,
		FirstDayOfYear as string,
		LastDayOfYear as string,
		IsHolidayUSA as string,
		HolidayUSA as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> SRCDimDate
